website_summaries.verdict: Nice design upgrade that creates a lighter club head, allowing players to generate more swing speed.
pros: These irons have precise positioning of weights in the club head that help keep the face aligned to the ball, improving accuracy of iron shots all over the course
Available from 4- to 9-irons, as well as a few different wedges
cons: The wedges have a high loft that may cost you a bit of distance

customer_reviews.title: Actual game improvement
customer_reviews.text: Rogue x really did improve my short game and iron play. Most important, I can rely on these clubs and have confidence in them. Easy to get airborne and accurate - very forgiving. Recommend as game improvement clubs. Note that lofts are higher eg pitching wedge plays as my previous 9 iron. - Callaway gimmick but got used to it quickly. Have gap, a wedge, pitching wedge, 7,8, 9
customer_reviews.author: L. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: missing link added
customer_reviews.text: I can save for and buy these great clubs one at a time and slowly build an A-One set of clubs. An easy and not so fast swing lead me to try a demo set. Each club added distance,no vibration and good visual at contact...So I am buying these irons through Amazon ....one at a time...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hit flop shot.
customer_reviews.text: I own a partial set of Rogue X irons. I give them five stars. The gap and approach wedges are first class. Besides sand, I use a sand wedge for fop shots for which I’m a skilled player. This sand wedge has too much bounce so fop shots can’t be done unless the ball is sitting up on tall grass. A real shame that I will return or send it to my golf club cemetery.
customer_reviews.author: Joegolfer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t think new irons could make a difference - but these did!
customer_reviews.text: Best clubs I’ve owned. Bought the SW to fill out the set. Very happy with it. 63 years old with 11 handicap. New iron set worth 2 strokes/ round.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bones

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I broke my x hot pitching wedge last year and bought this as a replacement, great club, hits slightly longer then my old one
customer_reviews.author: thatcher1123

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rogue X irons!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Rouge X irons! My set did not come with the AW and I am thrilled to add this club to my bag. Great irons, easy to hit and they go further than any irons I have ever used. Highly recommend to any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Kev & Tab

customer_reviews.title: Check the loft sheet
customer_reviews.text: this club in reality is a 4 iron not the 5 iron it says on the club because of the loft but the sound is quite amazing
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a lost club. This is a fine 5 iron. I'm impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know much about golfing as we are new to the game, but knew he didn’t have a 3 or 4 iron, so I bought this club as a Father’s Day gift for my hubby and it’s now his favorite club.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Strong lofts
customer_reviews.text: These irons are easy to hit and get great heights. Strong lofts means greater distance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Andrews

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LONG
customer_reviews.text: If it's distance you are looking for in a cavity back iron - these clubs will add an average of 10 yards per club as they are strong lofted. Hey ....the pro's have been bending clubs strong for years! Quality, great looking Callaway irons.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Delisio

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quality 9 iron to replace a "lost" 9 iron. This is perfect! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs if you like a very forgiving club with distance and control.
customer_reviews.author: Siouxz

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: Matched my set perfectly. Can’t wait to use it on the course.
customer_reviews.author: WRL136

customer_reviews.title: Perfect club
customer_reviews.text: This club went the yardage I expected it to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Solid feel.
customer_reviews.text: Four irons can be a challenge but this one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene W.

customer_reviews.title: The Rogue irons and hybrids with exception of sand and lob wedge were great
customer_reviews.text: While the rest of the Rogue set exceeded my expectations, the sand and lob wedge were 10 to 15 yards shorted than the Callaway Big Bertha ones which I bought to replace. I have the Big Bertha sand wedge and lob wedge back in my bag in lieu of the Rogue
customer_reviews.author: james e.

customer_reviews.title: Distance
customer_reviews.text: Love this iron bought just one to see how I hit it and wow awesome 10 -15 yards longer on shots callaway rogue x great value
customer_reviews.author: Philip Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: When was the last time you hit a 9-iron to 150 yard green
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome set of clubs, the extra strong lies are perfect to get that distance needed exceptionally forgiving and wonderfully balanced
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Condition: Used - Very Good - Um
customer_reviews.text: Very Good can mean different things. This says DEMO on handle and it looks as if it was one. Will keep would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgita

customer_reviews.title: Long and straight.
customer_reviews.text: Great distance and straight flight. Added 10-15 yards for each iron over my Taylormade M2 irons.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hager

customer_reviews.title: Great club for a beginner or experienced person
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to use Get a good swing out of if As a Beginner it’s a good club to use
customer_reviews.author: Jorge J.

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Rogue X 5 Iron graphite shaft
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered in the condition as described in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd M. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: hits the ball high and long - much easier to hit than a hybrid
customer_reviews.author: Alan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hit the mark!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Excellent feel with pitching results I needed to improve my game!
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I like how the clubs hold up and are easy to swing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of the clubs from US to Belgium was made as expected and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Eiji Namba

customer_reviews.title: Awesome club.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome club.!!!!! The most forgiving club I've ever played....mishits felt good and when you hit the sweet spot,the ball soared !!!!!....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance based on reviews, and it paid off!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Murillo

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2018 Men's Rogue X Individual Iron
product_meta.description: Golf Digest 2018 Hot List Gold Medal Winner! Rogue X Irons are a total distance overhaul, with our 360 Face Cup and VFT, multi-material construction, Urethane Microspheres, and a component package designed for maximum distance.
feature_bullets: 360 Face Cup + VFT for more Ball Speed
MIM'd Internal Standing Wave for Optimal Flight and Control

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
